pkgmetadata.longdescription: Em--Em is a terminal tool that prints FILE(s), or standard input to standardoutput and highlights the expressions that are matched the PATTERN.The expression will be highlighted iff the terminal is ANSI-compatible.Em is Cool``````````.. code:: bash $ tail -f /path/to/log | em "DEBUG|INFO" -f green | em "WARN"Links`````* `documentation <http://em.readthedocs.org/>`_* `source code <https://github.com/ikalnitsky/em>`_
